job_description:
Next.js Developer (7 Months - 1+ Years)

  • Knowledge of web performance optimization techniques, including lazy loading, code splitting, and caching, to ensure fast and efficient web performance.

  • Knowledge of deployment is a plus.

Performance & Optimization:

job_description:
Jr. Marketing Manager

Location: Kochi Job Type: Full-time Mode: Remote

Job Summary:

We are seeking a hands-on and experienced Jr. Marketing Manager with 1-3 years of experience to drive our marketing efforts. This role will involve executing campaigns, content creation, managing relationships with marketing freelancers, and setting up infrastructure to bring in inbound leads. The ideal candidate is someone who is into execution and has had exposure to managing field marketing initiatives such as trade shows, and collaborating closely with top management, sales, delivery heads, and project heads to align marketing strategies with business objectives.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Assist in developing and implementing marketing plans and campaigns across digital channels.
  • Support day-to-day execution of activities such as email campaigns, social media posts, and website updates.
  • Write engaging content for blogs, social media, websites, and marketing collateral.
  • Research industry topics and help maintain consistent messaging across channels.
  • Coordinate with design, content, and marketing freelancers.
  • Ensure timely delivery and quality of outsourced work.
  • Support planning and execution of trade shows, conferences, and promotional events.
  • Help with booth coordination, logistics, and on-ground marketing activities.
  • Assist in setting up landing pages, forms, and basic CRM workflows for lead capture.
  • Work with the senior team to improve conversion paths and track incoming leads.
  • Monitor campaign performance and maintain weekly/monthly marketing dashboards
  • Use analytics tools to track traffic, engagement, and lead generation
  • Work with sales and delivery heads to support ongoing marketing initiatives.
  • Ensure alignment between marketing activities and business priorities.
  • Help maintain brand guidelines across all marketing outputs.
  • Support content reviews and quality checks to ensure brand consistency.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelors degree in Engineering, Marketing, Business Administration, or related field
  • 1-3 years of experience in marketing Execution roles
  • Basic understanding of SEO/SEM, social media marketing, and email marketing.
  • Exposure of working with AI tools for building landing pages, design activities, content curation and marketing automation campaigns
  • Good writing skills and ability to create clear, engaging content.
  • Good communication skills and willingness to work closely with cross-functional teams.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lavanya.a@arttechgroup.com
summary: Jr. Marketing Manager to execute campaigns, create content, and manage freelancers. Role involves field marketing, lead generation setup, and collaboration with senior management.

job_description:
Kubernetes Engineer

Responsibilities: - Deploy, manage, and troubleshoot Kubernetes clusters (on-prem and cloud). - Build and optimize Docker images and manage container registries. - Implement CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD. - Automate infrastructure using Terraform, Ansible, Helm, Kustomize. - Manage cloud services: compute, storage, networking, IAM across AWS/Azure/GCP. - Configure Kubernetes networking, ingress controllers, RBAC, secrets, and security policies. - Implement monitoring/logging using Prometheus, Grafana, EFK/Loki. - Manage persistent storage and CSI integrations.

job_description:
Senior .Net Developer

We are looking for an experienced .NET Developer with a strong background in ASP.NET and .NET Core development. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining high-performance enterprise applications. You should be passionate about clean code, scalable architecture, API development, and working with modern cloud-based technologies.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and implement enterprise-grade applications using ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API, and .NET Core.
  • Build RESTful APIs, microservices, and backend services with optimized performance.
  • Participate in requirement analysis, solution design, technical documentation, and code reviews.
  • Write clean, efficient, testable, and reusable code following best practices and coding standards.
  • Integrate third-party services, databases, and cloud resources using secure patterns.
  • Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams including QA, DevOps, and UI/UX.
  • Troubleshoot production issues, perform RCA, and apply performance optimizations.
  • Implement automated unit testing, integration testing, and CI/CD best practices.
  • Participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies including sprint planning, story estimation, and demos.

Required Skills & Experience

  • 5+ years of hands-on development experience with ASP.NET and .NET Core frameworks.
  • Strong knowledge of C#, OOPS concepts, design patterns, and SOLID principles.
  • Experience in developing REST APIs, Web Services, Microservices architecture.
  • Strong experience with Entity Framework / EF Core and SQL databases (SQL Server, PostgreSQL, or MySQL).
  • Hands-on experience with JavaScript/TypeScript and front-end technologies (React/Angular is a plus but not mandatory).
  • Good understanding of authentication & authorization mechanisms (JWT, OAuth, Identity Server, etc.).
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP (Azure preferred).
  • Experience with Git, DevOps pipelines, CI/CD tools (Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins).
  • Solid understanding of application security, performance tuning, and debugging.

Good to Have

  • Experience with Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes, or serverless functions.
  • Knowledge of Message brokers (RabbitMQ, Kafka, SQS, or Azure Service Bus).
  • Exposure to Domain Driven Design (DDD) and Clean Architecture.
  • Familiarity with unit testing frameworks (xUnit, NUnit, MSTest).
  • Experience working with ORM optimization and query performance tuning.
  • Knowledge of logging and monitoring tools (Serilog, ELK/Grafana, App Insights).

Education

  • Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent professional experience)

Soft Skills

  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Strong communication and collaboration abilities
  • Ability to own features end-to-end and work independently
  • Willingness to learn modern patterns and new technologies

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at ajish.prabhakaran@focaloid.com
summary: Seeking a Senior .NET Developer experienced in ASP.NET and .NET Core for enterprise application development. Responsibilities include designing, building APIs, and working with cloud technologies.

Required Qualifications: - 5-6 years of hands-on development experience in Java. - Experience in application development using Spring and Spring Boot frameworks. - Proficient in SQL programming. - Experience with REST API development and integration. - Familiarity with integration patterns and best practices. - Basic understanding of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices. - Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a team. - Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

Preferred Qualifications: - Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. - Familiarity with containerization tools like Docker and Kubernetes. - Basic experience with front-end technologies like Next.js, React, and Node.js. - Knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies.

summary: Seeking a Java Back-End Developer with 5-6 years of experience to design and maintain scalable applications. Responsibilities include API development, CI/CD, and collaboration.

job_description:
Pre-Sales Analyst at Fingent

At Fingent, we believe that technology can make a meaningful difference to the lives around us. We create and provide software that is beautiful, usable, and compelling to solve complex business challenges. We nurture smart people who bring out the best in themselves, their peers, and their clients.

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Contribute to the sales team in driving revenue by qualifying leads.
  • Answer requests for information (RFIs) and requests for proposals (RFPs) in a detailed and professional level.
  • Prepare and deliver solution-based presentations and demonstrations to customers.
  • Execute on customer proof of concepts (POCs).
  • Work closely with the internal development team for solution and architecture recommendations.
  • Working with Sales to drive the pre-sales phase by introducing the Profile product/services offering and provide demonstrations, functionality, system architecture by interfacing with prospective and current customers and partners (both at business and technical level).
  • Understand the business and operational goals the prospect has and recommend a solution that ensures the optimum usage and utilization of Profile products and services; this can include a full pre-sales lifecycle from RFI response/requirement analysis, to running a scoping exercise or engage in a prototype/proof of concept for agreed requirements.
  • Having a detailed knowledge of the functionality and technology of the applications developed.
  • Ensuring that all materials such as presentations and demonstrations are maintained up to date.
  • Build on industry knowledge to support and deliver excellent presentations to clients and prospects.

Skills:

  • Keen interest in understanding and acquiring business knowledge.
  • Capability to comprehend client requirements and translate them into workflows and application features.
  • Ability to deliver presentations and demos to prospective clients effectively.
  • Proficient in documentation and note-taking abilities during client calls.
  • Proficiency in MS Office tools, including PowerPoint, Word, and Excel.
  • Strong analytical thinking, interpersonal skills, and excellent logical reasoning abilities.
  • Excellent business communication skills, both verbal and written.
  • Ability to work well under pressure and prioritize tasks effectively.

More Information:

Experience: 4+ Years

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@fingent.com
summary: Drive revenue by qualifying leads and responding to RFIs/RFPs. Deliver solution-based presentations and demos, understanding client needs for optimal product utilization.

job_description:
Odoo Developer (1-Year Contract)

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Location: Basement Floor, Periyar Building, Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum , 695581 Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Closing Date: 17, Dec 2025 Job Published: 08, Dec 2025 Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com

About Lean Transitions Solutions (LTS)

Founded over a decade ago with headquarters in the United Kingdom, Lean Transition Solutions Ltd (LTS) is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating Industry 4.0. LTS delivers Lean Industry 4.0 and Leadership 4.0 software solutions to world-class organizations globally, including Fortune 500 companies. With global locations in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico, our dedicated team ensures bespoke software solutions address industrial and manufacturing challenges. We uphold core values: Respect for All, Integrity, Collaboration, Creativity, Inclusiveness, and Empathy.

Job Overview

LTS is seeking an experienced Odoo Developer for a 1-year contract position. The ideal candidate will possess approximately 5 years of hands-on experience in Odoo development and customization, with strong expertise in Python, PostgreSQL, and the Odoo framework. This role involves developing, customizing, deploying, and maintaining Odoo modules to support business processes throughout the contract period.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop, customize, deploy, and maintain Odoo modules to meet client-specific requirements.
  • Modify and extend core Odoo functionalities to support complex business processes.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
  • Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve issues in existing applications.
  • Collaborate with project managers, designers, and QA teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
  • Support data migration, cleansing, and validation activities.
  • Ensure solutions adhere to security, performance, and scalability standards.
  • Contribute to DevOps pipelines and infrastructure automation where applicable.
  • Document technical designs, configurations, and customizations.
  • Provide guidance and mentorship on best practices for the Odoo development lifecycle.
  • Enhance system performance and ensure scalability of Odoo implementations.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge-sharing efforts.
  • Stay current with advancements in Odoo development and emerging industry practices.

Preferred Skills

  • 5+ years of hands-on experience with Odoo ERP (Enterprise preferred).
  • Strong knowledge of Odoo ORM, module architecture, and security framework.
  • Proficiency in Python and PostgreSQL.
  • Proven experience in Odoo deployment on cloud or on-premise environments.
  • Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure.
  • Comfortable working in Agile development environments.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to communicate technical ideas clearly.

Nice to Have

  • Exposure to agentic AI, RPA, or AI-driven process automation.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines.

Contract Details

  • Contract Duration: 1 Year

How to Apply

Interested candidates should forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line “Odoo Developer – Contract”. Please include the following information in the email content:

  • Current CTC
  • Expected CTC
  • Notice Period
  • Current Location
  • Total Relevant Experience
  • Willingness to work at the office
summary: Seeking an Odoo Developer with 5 years of experience for a 1-year contract. Responsibilities include module development, customization, deployment, and maintenance using Python and PostgreSQL.

job_description:
Full Stack Developer (React.js and Node.js)

Company: Ferns IT Solutions (P) Ltd Location: Module No.03, 2nd floor, Thejaswini Building, Phase I, Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala (Onsite Role) Contact: jobs@ferns-it.com Published: 08, Dec 2025 Closing Date: 25, Dec 2025

Brief Description

We are seeking a skilled Full Stack Developer with 2–3 years of experience in React.js, Next.js, and Node.js. The role requires working knowledge of DevOps and AI-based tools, with the ability to manage full project lifecycles from development to deployment, ensuring performance, security, and scalability.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop modern, high-quality web applications using React.js, Next.js, and Node.js.
  • Implement server-side logic using Node.js (Express.js) and integrate APIs efficiently.
  • Utilize Next.js features such as SSR, SSG, routing, and API routes.
  • Build reusable and scalable UI components with React.js.
  • Translate UI/UX wireframes into responsive and pixel-perfect front-end layouts.
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines, manage deployments, and support DevOps tasks (environment setup, server monitoring, version control).
  • Manage application hosting on VPS/Cloud servers, including deployments, backups, and performance monitoring.
  • Integrate AI tools, automation, or AI APIs to enhance functionality.
  • Optimize applications for speed, efficiency, and scalability across devices and browsers.
  • Troubleshoot issues, debug applications, and maintain code quality and security standards.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams for timely project delivery.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience: 2–3 years of hands-on experience with React.js, Next.js, and Node.js.
  • Frontend: Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, responsive UI development.
  • Backend: Experience with Express.js, RESTful APIs, third-party integrations.
  • Next.js: Strong understanding of Routing, SSR, SSG, API Routes.
  • Databases: Knowledge of MongoDB or MySQL.
  • DevOps: Good understanding of CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions/GitLab CI/Jenkins), VPS/Cloud deployment, server monitoring, basic Docker/containerization.
  • Cloud: Familiarity with AWS, Google Cloud, or DigitalOcean.
  • Real-time: Experience in real-time applications (Socket.io preferred).
  • Optimization: Knowledge of security best practices, performance optimization, code splitting.
  • AI: Familiarity with AI tools, automation tools, or AI integrations (e.g., OpenAI).
  • Soft Skills: Strong debugging, problem-solving, analytical, communication, and teamwork abilities.
  • Version Control: Proficiency with Git.

Candidate Preference

  • Preferred Candidate Location: Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala
  • Candidates who can work from the office will be preferred for this onsite role.

How to Apply

Send your updated resume with the subject line: “Resume for Full Stack Developer Vacancy – Dec 2025” to jobs@ferns-it.com.

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the interview process.
summary: Seeking a Full Stack Developer with 2-3 years of experience in React.js, Next.js, and Node.js. Role involves full project lifecycle management, including DevOps and AI integration, for an onsite position.

job_description:
Odoo Developer

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Location: Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum, India Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com

About Lean Transitions Solutions (LTS)

Founded over a decade ago and headquartered in the United Kingdom, Lean Transition Solutions Ltd (LTS) is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating for Industry 4.0. LTS delivers Lean Industry 4.0 software and Leadership 4.0 solutions to world-class organizations globally, including Fortune 500 companies. With global presence in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico, LTS is dedicated to meeting client requirements with bespoke software solutions that address industrial and manufacturing challenges. Our culture nurtures core values: Respect for All, Integrity, Collaboration, Creativity, Inclusiveness, and Empathy.

Address: Lean transition Solutions, Periyar Building, Technopark Phase 1, Trivandrum.

About the Role

LTS is seeking an experienced Odoo Developer with approximately 3 years of hands-on experience in Odoo development and customization. The ideal candidate will possess strong expertise in Python, PostgreSQL, and the Odoo framework, with the ability to develop, customize, and maintain Odoo modules to support business processes.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop, customize, and maintain Odoo modules to suit client-specific needs.
  • Modify and extend core Odoo functionalities to support unique business processes.
  • Produce clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
  • Identify and resolve issues within existing applications.
  • Collaborate with project managers, designers, and QA teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
  • Support data migration, cleansing, and validation activities.
  • Ensure solutions adhere to security standards.
  • Contribute to DevOps pipelines and infrastructure automation where applicable.
  • Document technical designs, configurations, and customizations.
  • Provide guidance on best practices for Odoo lifecycle management.
  • Enhance system performance and ensure scalability of Odoo implementations.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge-sharing efforts.
  • Stay current with advancements in Odoo development and emerging industry practices.

Preferred Skills

  • 3+ years of hands-on experience with Odoo ERP (Enterprise preferred).
  • Strong knowledge of Odoo ORM, module architecture, and security framework.
  • Proficiency in Python and PostgreSQL.
  • Experience in Odoo deployment on cloud or on-premise environments.
  • Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure.
  • Comfortable working in Agile development environments.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to communicate technical ideas clearly.

Nice to Have

  • Exposure to agentic AI, RPA, or AI-driven process automation.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines.

How to Apply

Interested candidates are invited to forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line “Odoo Developer”. Please include the following information in the email content:

  • Current CTC:
  • Expected CTC:
  • Notice Period:
  • Current Location:
  • Total Relevant Experience:
  • Willingness to work at office:

Closing Date: December 17, 2025 Job Published: December 08, 2025
summary: Experienced Odoo Developer sought for module customization and maintenance. Requires Python, PostgreSQL, and Odoo framework expertise to support global business processes.

job_description:
QA Lead - GNX Digital Solutions (P) Ltd

Location: TECHNOPARK, Trivandrum, India Contact: hr@gnxsolutions.in Closing Date: December 15, 2025 Published: December 08, 2025

Job Summary

We are seeking an experienced QA Lead to guide our Quality Assurance team in both manual and automation testing. The ideal candidate possesses strong technical skills, leadership capabilities, and practical experience in creating test strategies, maintaining product quality, and enhancing QA processes.

Key Responsibilities:

Leadership & Team Management - Lead, mentor, and guide the QA team (manual & automation testers). - Assign tasks, manage workloads, and ensure timely delivery of testing activities. - Conduct regular review meetings, performance evaluations, and skill development planning.

Test Planning & Strategy - Develop and maintain comprehensive test strategies, plans, and processes. - Coordinate testing efforts across multiple projects/releases. - Identify risks, create mitigation plans, and ensure high-quality standards.

Manual Testing - Oversee and participate in functional, regression, integration, system, and UAT testing. - Review test scenarios, test cases, and ensure proper coverage. - Validate product functionality and ensure adherence to requirements.

Automation Testing - Design, develop, and maintain test automation frameworks (UI/API). - Identify test cases for automation and drive automation coverage. - Work with the development team for CI/CD integration and test optimization.

Quality Governance - Ensure bug reporting, tracking, and closure through appropriate tools. - Define QA metrics and generate quality reports for stakeholders. - Drive process improvements, best practices, and standardization across QA.

Collaboration - Work closely with developers, product managers, business analysts, and DevOps teams. - Participate in requirement reviews, design discussions, and sprint planning. - Act as the QA point-of-contact for project stakeholders.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • 6+ years of experience in software testing, with at least 2–3 years in a lead role.
  • Strong experience in both manual and automation testing.
  • Hands-on experience with automation tools such as Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, Appium, or similar.
  • Experience in API testing with tools like Postman, RestAssured, etc.
  • Good understanding of CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab, Azure DevOps).
  • Strong knowledge of SDLC, STLC, Agile/Scrum methodologies.
  • Expertise in test case design, defect tracking, and test planning.
  • Excellent leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills.

Good to Have:

  • Experience in performance testing (JMeter, LoadRunner).
  • Exposure to cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP).
  • Experience in web, mobile, and API test automation.
  • ISTQB or other testing certifications.

Company: GNX Digital Solutions (P) Ltd Website: https://gnxsolutions.in
summary: Lead QA team for manual and automation testing. Develop test strategies, ensure quality, and mentor testers. Requires 6+ years of experience.
